name: Business Woman Simulator
description:
Have you always wanted to be a girlboss?  Well, here's the game for you! Come play and learn how to thrive in a world dominated by men and kill it. Be the girlboss you've always wanted to be!

Controls:

  • Space-bar to progress throught the story;
  • Computer Game:
    • Go to your email app and anwser or trash all the emails in your inbox;
  • Letters Game:
    • Click and drag to open the letters;
Coffee'n Jam

This game was made for the Coffee'n Jam by:

  • Fábio Sousa
  • Gonçalo Goulão
  • José Siopa

We are members of GameDev Técnico
